output.sentences: Our town has the most amazing site so we decided to do a bit of sightseeing and started at the amazing fountain
The is a fascinating metal sculpture beside the fountain.
After that we looked at some interesting wooden pictures.
We then visited the turret in the centre of the town.
This is a picture to the entrance of the town hall which is where we finished out sightseeing today.
